text: Ronald Everett Tompkins (born November 27, 1944) is an American former professional baseball pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Kansas City Athletics (1965) and Chicago Cubs (1971). ==External links== , or Retrosheet *Pura Pelota (Venezuelan Winter League) Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Águilas del Zulia players Category:Baseball players from California Category:Binghamton Triplets players Category:Birmingham Barons players Category:Cardenales de Lara players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Daytona Beach Islanders players Category:Florida Instructional League Athletics players Category:Indianapolis Indians players Category:Lewiston Broncs players Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Navegantes del Magallanes players Category:Portland Beavers players Category:Richmond Braves players Category:Sportspeople from San Diego Category:Vancouver Mounties players Category:Wichita Aeros players
title: Ron Tompkins
